db:section.db:title: xExtent : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the x extent of the mesh.

db:section.db:title: xyMeshResolution : size
db:section.db:para: Holds the x-y resolution of the mesh. The width and height values of this property specify the number of vertices generated for the x-y faces of the mesh.

db:section.db:title: xzMeshResolution : size
db:section.db:para: Holds the x-z resolution of the mesh. The width and height values of this property specify the number of vertices generated for the x-z faces of the mesh.

db:section.db:title: yExtent : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the y extent of the mesh.

db:section.db:title: yzMeshResolution : size
db:section.db:para: Holds the y-z resolution of the mesh. The width and height values of this property specify the number of vertices generated for the y-z faces of the mesh.

db:section.db:title: zExtent : real
db:section.db:para: Holds the z extent of the mesh.
